name: DeleteProjectStatus
description:
Delete a specific project status update in Asana.

This tool deletes an existing project status update in Asana. It should be called when you need to remove a specific status update from a project. Note: This endpoint is deprecated; consider using the `/status_updates/{status_gid}` route for new integrations.

parameters.name: project_status_id
parameters.description: The identifier for the project status update you wish to delete.

value_schema.description: The project status update to get.

parameters.name: pretty_output
parameters.description: Enable pretty output for readable formatting during debugging; increases response size and time.

value_schema.description:
Provides “pretty” output.
Provides the response in a “pretty” format. In the case of JSON this means doing proper line breaking and indentation to make it readable. This will take extra time and increase the response size so it is advisable only to use this during debugging.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the asana API.

parameters.description:

value_schema.description:

parameters.name: project_status_gid
parameters.description: The project status update to get.

value_schema.description: The project status update to get.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
